Package Description
dao

  • Uses of Paragraphe in dao

    Methods in dao that return Paragraphe
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Paragraphe ParagrapheDAO.getParagraphe​(java.lang.String titleStory, int idPar)
    this method allows to get all the information stored in the data base about a paragraph identified by the given parameters
    Paragraphe ChoixDAO.retreiveCorrPar​(int idChoice)
    this method allows to retrieve the data stored about the paragraph associated to a certain choice identified by the given parameter
    Paragraphe ParagrapheDAO.turnIntoOneParagraph​(java.lang.String titleStory, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> idPars)
    this method takes a list of paragraphs and groups there texts in one text and stores the names of all the authors
    Methods in dao that return types with arguments of type Paragraphe
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.LinkedList<Paragraphe> ParagrapheDAO.parWroteBy​(java.lang.String user)
    allows to retrieve all the paragraphs written by a given user
    Methods in dao with parameters of type Paragraphe
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int ParagrapheDAO.addParagraphe​(Paragraphe p, boolean validated, boolean isConclusion)
    allows to add a paragraph in the data base
